title: Is Karma the same thing as fate? How the past catches up with you? - Quora

response.answer_text: NO, ABSOLUTELY NOT! fate [fāt] NOUN the development of events beyond a person's control, regarded as determined by a supernatural power." fate decided his course for him" · [more] synonyms: destiny · providence · God's will · nemesis · kismet · astral influence · [more] greek & roman mythology(the Fates)three goddesses who presided over the birth and life of humans. Each person's destiny was thought of as a thread spun, measured, and cut by the three Fates, Clotho, Lachesis, and Atropos.Also called Moirai and Parcae. synonyms:the weird sisters · the Parcae · the Moirai · the Norns VERB (be fated) be destined to happen, turn out, or act in a particular way." the regime was fated to end badly" synonyms:be predestined · be preordained · be foreordained · be destined · be meant · be doomed · be foredoomed · be cursed · be damned · be sure · be certain · be bound · be guaranteed · be inevitable · be inescapable · be ineluctable FATE is a “destiny” of events that someone/something else has determined, for what ever reason, for the person to experience, whether deserved or not. KARMA, is the “returning” of an experience to the person who created it, so that this person can experience the same action, word, or thought being DONE TO THEM! What YOU create by action, word, or thought, shall be done to you, so the soul can learn by experiencing whether that action, word, or thought is “good” to receive or “not good” to receive. THE MAJOR DIFFERENCE BETWEEN FATE AND KARMA IS THAT WITH FATE, IS FULLY DETERMINED BY ANOTHER ETITY THAT HAS THAT POWER BUT MAY NOT HAVE A LOGICAL REASON FOR DOING SO. WITH KARMA, YOU CREATE WHAT IS DONE TO YOU, “ALWAYS” AND YOU REAP WHAT YOU SOW……..KARMICALLY, IN “EXACTLY” THE SAME MEASURE. KARMA DOES NOT JUDGE, KARMA DOES NOT PUNISH, KARMA MERELY TRASPORTS THE ENERGY OF YOUR ACTION BACK TO YOU AT A FUTURE DATE, SO THAT YOU CAN EXPERIENCE THE EXACT SAME ACTION “DONE TO YOU.” YOU CANNOT BLAME GOD FOR YOUR “SUFFERING.” GOD DID “NOT” CREATE THE ENERGY THAT MAKES YOU “SUFFER”, YOU DID. KARMA is what catches up with you from your past. Fate is a destiny you have no control over. Karma is something you “DO HAVE CONTROL OVER,” because you create it, NOT SOMEONE/SOMETHING ELSE. Just saying……

Fate is a belief that the events of your life are written even before it begins. Karma is a belief that your ignorant choices pave the road to your future suffering. Unlike fate, the idea of karma does not claim to know upfront what exactly will happen to you in the future. It only claims to know what will happen to your future feelings when you predisposition yourself towards them by forming attachments that are guaranteed to be broken at some point. Karma catches up with you because by making a karmic choice you bind yourself to an expectation. You carry that expectation until the time inevitably comes when it betrays you. At that moment you suffer. It does not matter what exactly will happen. What matters is that something will definitely happen - something that you have already decided not to like by attaching yourself to a more favorable ideal scenario. If you did not, that something could still happen, but you would not suffer. TLDR: fate says your choices do not matter. Karma says your choices are all that matters. In your life, anyway.
